name: PromotionOfExerciseICD10
title: Promotion of Exercise (ICD10)
description: This value set contains ICD-10 concepts for promotion of exercise and physical activity.
purpose: (Clinical Focus: This value set contains ICD-10 concepts for promotion of exercise and physical activity.),(Data Element Scope: The intent of this data element is to identify patients who receive interventions aimed at increasing physical exercise. This element may map to the "Intervention" Category of the Quality Data Model.),(Inclusion Criteria: Includes concepts for promotion of general physical activity and exercise.),(Exclusion Criteria: Excludes concepts for discussion, education, or counseling related to generic activity (i.e., activities of daily living, ambulation, etc.). Excludes concepts for referral to physical therapy.)
